mapper.select: SELECT SM.MENUITEM menuname, soper.OPERNAME, sm.menuid FROM TB_SYS_FUNC sf JOIN TB_SYS_MENU sm ON SF.MENUID = SM.MENUID JOIN TB_SYS_OPERATE soper ON sf.OPERID = soper.OPERID WHERE sf.url = #{url}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_SYS_LOG ( ID, USERID, USERNAME, CREATETIME, IP, menuname, opername, retain1, retain2, retain3, SOURCE, menuid ) VALUES ( #{log.id:VARCHAR}, #{log.userid:VARCHAR}, #{log.username:VARCHAR}, #{log.createtime:VARCHAR}, #{log.ip:VARCHAR}, #{log.menuname:VARCHAR}, #{log.opername:VARCHAR}, #{log.retain1:VARCHAR}, #{log.retain2:VARCHAR}, #{log.retain3:VARCHAR}, #{log.source:INTEGER}, #{log.menuid:VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM TB_SYS_LOG syslog WHERE 1=1
and ( syslog.ID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or syslog.USERID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or syslog.USERNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or syslog.IP LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or syslog.MENUNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or syslog.OPERNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or syslog.RETAIN2 LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') )
and syslog.source=#{source}
order by syslog.CREATETIME desc
